Package ie.atu.sw.simplifiermenu

Class WordReplacerSettingsMenu

java.lang.Object
ie.atu.sw.menu.Menu
ie.atu.sw.menu.SettingsMenu
ie.atu.sw.simplifiermenu.WordReplacerSettingsMenu
Direct Known Subclasses:
ReplacementMethodSettingsMenu, SimilarityAlgorithmSettingsMenu, SimplifierSettingsMenu
public abstract class WordReplacerSettingsMenu extends SettingsMenu
Abstract class representing a settings menu for configuring WordReplacer settings.

    • WordReplacerSettingsMenu

      public WordReplacerSettingsMenu(InputReaderInterface inputReader, MenuPrinterInterface menuPrinter, Preferences preferences, WordReplacerAbstract wordReplacer)
      Constructor to initialize the WordReplacerSettingsMenu with required parameters.
      Parameters:
      inputReader - the input reader interface for user input.
      menuPrinter - the menu printer interface for output.
      preferences - the preferences object for storing settings.
      wordReplacer - the WordReplacerAbstract instance to configure.

    • initWordReplacer

      protected abstract void initWordReplacer()
      Abstract method to initialize the WordReplacer settings. Implementations should configure specific settings for the WordReplacer.
